Package com.nrifintech.cms.repositories

Interface OrderRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Order,​Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Order,​Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Order,​Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Order>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Order,​Integer>
public interface OrderRepo extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Order,​Integer>

  • Method Details

    • autoArchive

      @Modifying @Query(value="update orders set status = 2 where status = 0 and Cast(order_placed as date) = :date", nativeQuery=true) void autoArchive​(@Param("date") String date)
      It updates the status of all orders with status 0 (pending) to 2 (archived) if the order was placed on the date passed as a parameter
      Parameters:
      date - The date on which the order was placed.

    • getDaybyDaySales

      @Query(value="select Cast(Cast(order_delivered as date) as char) as date , sum(amount) as value from orders,transaction where orders.transaction_id = transaction.id group by date having date between :date1 and :date2", nativeQuery=true) List<javax.persistence.Tuple> getDaybyDaySales​(@Param("date1") String date1, @Param("date2") String date2)
      It returns a list of tuples, each tuple contains a date and a value, the date is the date of the order, the value is the sum of the amount of the orders that were delivered on that date
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the range
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A list of tuples.

    • getTotalSales

      @Query(value="select sum(amount) as value from orders,transaction where orders.transaction_id = transaction.id and Cast(order_delivered as date) between :date1 and :date2", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Double> getTotalSales​(@Param("date1") String date1, @Param("date2") String date2)
      It returns the total sales of the store between two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the period
      date2 - The end date of the period
      Returns:
      A double value

    • getOrderStats

      @Query(value="select status , count(id) from orders where cast(order_placed as date) between :date1 and :date2 group by status", nativeQuery=true) List<javax.persistence.Tuple> getOrderStats​(@Param("date1") String date1, @Param("date2") String date2)
      It returns a list of tuples, each tuple containing the status of the order and the count of orders with that status
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the range
      date2 - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of tuples.

    • getBreakfastVsLunchStats

      @Query(value="select order_type , count(id) from orders where cast(order_delivered as date) between :date1 and :date2 group by order_type", nativeQuery=true) List<javax.persistence.Tuple> getBreakfastVsLunchStats​(@Param("date1") String date1, @Param("date2") String date2)
      It returns a list of tuples, each tuple containing the order type and the number of orders of that type, for the orders that were delivered between the two dates passed as parameters
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the range
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A list of tuples.

    • findByOrderPlaced

      @Query(value="select * from orders where Cast(order_placed as date) = :date and status != 3", nativeQuery=true) List<Order> findByOrderPlaced​(@Param("date") String date)
      It returns a list of orders where the order_placed column is equal to the date passed in as a parameter
      Parameters:
      date - The date to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of orders
